ch0017_10_leaf/0101_0701_02_10:
Being part of a sync pair is what makes Pasio
so much fun, don’t you think? I could never be
bored with my partner around!
ch0017_10_leaf/0601_0701_01_10:
Walking along with a Poké Ball in my hand used
to make me feel so confident.
ch0017_10_leaf/0601_0701_02_10:
But being able to walk alongside my Pokémon all
the time here on Pasio has blasted that confidence
through the roof!
ch0017_10_leaf/0601_0701_03_10:
My partner and I are always looking out
for each other!
ch0017_10_leaf/0602_0701_01_10:
My policy is to always take care of my Pokémon
and keep them out of danger.
ch0017_10_leaf/0602_0701_02_10:
I don’t want my Pokémon to do anything that could
get them hurt, but if I say no to everything, that
would be really boring for them.
ch0017_10_leaf/0602_0701_03_10:
I mean, you’ve gotta respect their freedom!
I can watch over my Pokémon but still give them
plenty of room to have fun.
ch0017_10_leaf/0603_0701_01_10:
I love lying down in the sun when the weather
is nice.
ch0017_10_leaf/0603_0701_02_10:
The forest, a grassy field, the beach...anywhere!
Lying down and listening to the sounds of nature
always makes me feel good.
ch0017_10_leaf/0603_0701_03_10:
I’ve definitely dozed off by accident and caught a
cold once or twice doing that, though.
ch0017_10_leaf/0604_0701_01_10: I have a really funny friend back in Kanto.
ch0017_10_leaf/0604_0701_02_10:
She copies everything I say and repeats it back
to me. Weird, huh!
ch0017_10_leaf/0604_0701_03_10:
She’s a bit of a strange cookie, but after I gave
her a Poké Doll, the two of us became really
good friends!
ch0017_10_leaf/0605_0701_01_10:
Ever since I started wearing my sygna suit, I’ve
felt a little different somehow.
ch0017_10_leaf/0605_0701_02_10:
It feels like my partner and I are closer than
we’ve ever been—like we truly understand
each other!
ch0017_10_leaf/0605_0701_03_10:
Next time we battle, I’ll show you just how much
our strength has blossomed!
ch0017_10_leaf/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! I’ve been looking all over for you!
ch0017_10_leaf/1701_0701_02_10: I have a present for you. Hope it comes in handy!
ch0017_10_leaf/1701_0702_01_10: What do you think? Pretty cool, huh!
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0701_01_10:
Once I battle someone, they’ll always be a friend
in my book!
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0701_02_10:
I love how battling brings people together,
whether we win or lose!
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0701_03_10: Don’t you think that’s awesome? I love Pokémon!
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0702_01_10:
If we want to get to know each other better, all
we have to do is battle a bunch more, right?
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0702_02_10:
Come on, let’s do it right now! Don’t expect me to
go easy on you just because we’re friends, though!
ch0017_10_leaf/2501_0702_03_10:
*giggle* Kidding, kidding... I’ve got to do some
more training before the two of us battle again!
ch0017_10_leaf/2511_0701_01_10:
I like collecting flowers and turning them into
little flower crowns.
ch0017_10_leaf/2511_0701_02_10:
When I’m collecting them, I form a picture of the
person I’m making the crown for in my head and
try to find flowers that would suit them best.
ch0017_10_leaf/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s a lot of fun! Next time, I’ll have to try making
one for you! Look forward to it, OK?
ch0017_10_leaf/2511_0702_01_10:
Hmm... What kind of flowers would suit you best?
Maybe some bright, energetic yellow ones...
or some sweet, gentle green ones...
ch0017_10_leaf/2511_0702_02_10:
There are so many options, it’s hard to choose.
I could always use a mix of different colors, too!
Yeah, I’ll go with that!
ch0017_10_leaf/3001_0701_01_10:
Brush that sleepiness away! Say it loud, and say it
proud—good morning!
ch0017_10_leaf/3003_0701_01_10: Hey there! Perfect time to get some sun, isn’t it?
ch0017_10_leaf/3005_0701_01_10:
Time to continue our super-exciting,
heart-pounding adventures...in dreamland!
